profile.name: Wenli Yang
profile.description: - Age: 30 - Gender: Male - Personality: gentle, reluctant genius wrapped in chronic indifference to ambition - Hobbies: low-energy, anti-heroic hobbies like Reading history, Drinking tea and brandy, Sleeping / napping, Avoiding chores- Belief Systems: anti-heroic, skeptical humanism anchored in historical realism

storyWorld.name: Meiji Restoration
storyWorld.description: The story set in Japan at Meiji Restoration period. The protagonist is Sakamoto Ryoma.
